AnimationPlaybackEvent.summary: The AnimationPlaybackEvent interface of the Web Animations API represents animation events.

remarks.para: As animations play, they report changes to their through animation events.

AnimationPlaybackEventAnimationPlaybackE.summary: The AnimationPlaybackEvent() constructor of the Web Animations API returns a new object instance.

AnimationPlaybackEventCurrentTime.summary: The currentTime read-only property of the interface represents the current time of the animation that generated the event at the moment the event is queued. This will be unresolved if the animation was idle at the time the event was generated.
AnimationPlaybackEventCurrentTime.value: A number representing the current time in milliseconds, or null.

AnimationPlaybackEventTimelineTime.summary: The timelineTime read-only property of the interface represents the time value of the animation's at the moment the event is queued. This will be unresolved if the animation was not associated with a timeline at the time the event was generated or if the associated timeline was inactive.
AnimationPlaybackEventTimelineTime.value: A number representing the current time in milliseconds, or null.
